title: Melbourne Based Team LF Members, Kitzu eSports
body:
Kitzu eSports LF members to play in LAN games in Melbourne,
Needs to be Diamond+ and have a versatile champion pool.
Must have a decent mic and Team speak.

This will be a semi pro team.

Mid -
Top -
Jungle - XSirCution
ADC - 
Support - 

Coach -
Analyst - 
Manager - 

Please contact me if you are interested, either in game or from the forums.

replies.body: idk how 'pro' this team is going to be but when you finish designing your team here is a good spot for minor League tournaments https://www.pacificpeninsula.net/index.php?site=tournaments
